frontmatter.name: Saving and reusing payment methods

frontmatter.name: Using Checkout for one-time purchases
frontmatter.description: A demo of using Checkout for one-time payments. Has two integrations one using the client-only implementation and one using Checkout Sessions for a client and server solution.

frontmatter.name: Using Checkout to create a subscription
frontmatter.description: A demo of using the API to create a Checkout Sessions that starts a subscription and optionally adds line items to the order. Uses webhooks to fulfill.
